#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long
#define ld long double
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld",x)
#define sld(x) scanf("%Lf",&x)
#define pld(x) printf("%0.6Lf",x)
#define pline() printf("\n")

int main(){
    ll i,h;
    ld n,a[102],m,sum=0;
    ld ans1,ans2,res;
    sld(n);sld(m);sl(h);
    //pld(n);
    for(i=1;i<=m;i++){
        sld(a[i]);
        sum+=a[i];
    }
    if(sum>=n){
        sum--;ans1=1;ans2=1;
        //cout<<sum<<endl;
        for(i=0;i<=n-2;i++){
            ans1*=(sum-i)/(i+1);
            //cout<<ans1<<endl;
        }

        sum++;
        sum=sum-a[h];
        //cout<<endl;
        for(i=0;i<=n-2;i++){
            ans2*=(sum-i)/(i+1);
            //cout<<ans2<<endl;
        }
        
        res=(ans1-ans2)/ans1;
        pld(res);
    }
    else
    printf("-1");
    pline();
	return 0;
}
